duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare monthly accounts, trial balance, financial statements, and variance analysis.
Coordinate with external auditors and lead special projects.
Maintain accounting records and close monthly and quarterly books within deadlines.
Assess current accounting operations and implement improvements and internal controls.
Prepare analysis and reconciliation of expense and balance sheet accounts.
Lead preparation of tax returns, audit work papers, and ensure compliance with statutory laws and reporting requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Finance (CPA or CMA preferred)
